name: Microsoft PowerPoint HTML Presentation
summary: A PPTHTML file is an HTML version of a .PPT file created with Microsoft PowerPoint, a program used for creating presentations. It contains HTML that can be used to display the presentation with formatting similar to the original PPT file. PPTHTML files are primarily used for viewing published presentations in a web browser.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft PowerPoint

macos.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft PowerPoint
